title: DOBLEBIT
author: DOBLEBIT
created_time: June 29, 2023, 06:04:06 PMLast edit: July 01, 2023, 02:54:39 PM by DOBLEBIT
content: *DOBLEBIT FREEDOM MASK*WE ARE DELIGHTED TO PRESENT OUR NEW PROJECT. IT CONSISTS OF 21 ANODIZED MASKS, EACH NUMBERED AND LOADED WITH 0.0021 BTC.THE PROCESS OF CREATING EACH PRIVATE KEY HAS BEEN CARRIED OUT IN A TOTALLY SECURE WAY.-IT WAS DONE USING A BRAND NEW COMPUTER, OFFLINE, WITH NO INTERNET CONNECTION EVER.                   -USING RESISTANT PAPER, WHERE WE HOLD THE PRIVATE KEY BOTH IN QR CODE AND IN ALPHANUMERIC CODE. -NEW PRINTER DEDICATED EXCLUSIVELY TO THIS PURPOSE, NEVER CONNECTED TO THE NETWORK.                                          -ALWAYS MAXIMUM SECURITY WHEN WORKING WITH PRIVATE KEYS, IT IS OUR RESPONSIBILITY THAT EVERYTHING IS CORRECT. INFORMATION OF INTERESTAMOUNT --> 21 UNITS             MATERIAL --> ANODIZED ZAMAK           SIZE --> 7cm x 5cm LOAD IN BITCOIN --> 0.0021BTCWEIGHT --> 77 GRAMSWE ARE GOING TO AUCTION 7 PIECES IN THIS THREAD AND IN THE FUTURE WE WILL PUT 10 FOR SALE. 4 PIECES ARE FOR THE CREATORS OF THE PROJECT.AUCTION LOTS:(lot 1; lot 2; lot 3; lot 4; lot 5; lot 6;lot 9)DURING THE MANUAL NUMBERING AND MANUFACTURING PROCESS, SOME PIECES MAY EXHIBIT VISIBLE IMPERFECTIONS ON THE BACK. THESE IMPERFECTIONS ARE AN INHERENT PART OF THE PROCESS AND CONTRIBUTE TO THE UNIQUE CHARACTER OF EACH PIECE. EACH ONE FEATURES DISTINCTIVE COLORS OR GOLD ACCENTS, MAKING THEM EVEN MORE SPECIAL. INITIAL BID PER LOT: 0.0035 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001 BTCEND TIME: Tuesday, July 4, 7:00 p.m. New York https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20230704T19&p0=179&ud=1&font=cursivaBids do not include 0.0021 BTC upload value, winners must also deposit 0.0021 BTC to the skin address upon winning the auction.When placing your bid, post your username followed by the lot number and followed by the bid amount. (Example: doblebit - LOT 01 - .0035 BTC)REGULATION:PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qh7dfrekwuhheac842ewzp9agvj67sqpk630pxg   Payment due within 48 hours of auction end.SNIPE: Any bid placed in the last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the PER LOT end time. If a new bid is placed within those extended 5 minutes, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of said LOT bid.SHIPMENT: $20 added at the end. Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties. Possibility of shipping to Minerjones or MoparMiningLLCCode:SERIAL / PUBLIC ADDRESS1/21 -->  13xJQ2eodURAjDkeUNCjATwgpWrGp1t2AR  2/21 -->  1NdVHNVwSZELGAMmmsuLemR9nSpdSh7HyH3/21 -->  1CRKhGNTffudrQV6YgNULH7HXpSK6HykFW4/21 -->  17u6h5BynvMf5zDUzQV9hWeqByVtkeKnkJ5/21 -->  1HhaGay1wpTC95wEMsDWfpDW7mZGCxg1at 6/21 -->  1MvoEdYwVZuaDdax8p5fqWtgfgdjhhjmuW7/21 -->  18G2yEwfskQaNJkksnz5NNk3DWdLzpqweX8/21 -->  17h6AbVF57CBgsuP9mRzYWuPDtQB5MznKW9/21 -->  1JvPRYkdKV1icEVwVcMptGVuA7899Sy84D 10/21 -->  1Q6Gw7Huu2YZKhkPUSZjcHqeDUPD1H5XV411/21 -->  1C4LsEKQ2ke5qEe8Z9yeqgHmLmRkRU8R9g12/21 -->  1M2Rk7rgxAzCRoVkTbYEnbwYHvwKcDTFYa13/21 -->  1526EafuvEbyifFtzZHApmJY9fjs5jHKcd14/21 -->  1DSJA28kg8i9oTwZMkSijgMYmTLPnRSypN15/21 -->  1HfVoduoZqQDp1pEVQqzdZ7eqsgY4XMCcJ16/21 -->  1XrNXKJyDgDb9goDjXr7NReUQ3ZHN9LMN17/21 -->  19hRqnEFkZqm8zX3nL85KA7eMVUKVkHBdH 18/21 -->  1KrvESKxx9XVVKCFeF7GMVMBEFWTsCAQmF19/21 -->  1M6Cc31mUD4UPXAnhvnGanRLH5JdE7FWXV20/21 -->  1ABkvdpieCdHmH4PbpBiDswhPEhRLEppjG21/21 -->  1NPkCdnzzhFBJFzvg3UvJkB8hmtxmfVXp1
